name: Porygon2
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, though.

abilities.name: Energy Converter
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose 1 basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon and choose an Energy type. Treat that Energy card as that type until the end of your turn. This power can’t be used if Porygon2 is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed. If Porygon2 becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed, the Energy card goes back to its original type.

attacks.name: Delta Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose whether the Defending Pokémon becomes Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.
